channel.title: Making a batch file load from a .dat file?
channel.description:
Lets say i have a data file, and inside its coded in shell, how would i tell a batch file to run that.
Well, i found out. but it asks what i want to open it with
is there a way to like [code] start FILE.DAT with cmd.exe [/code] ?

item.title: Making a batch file load from a .dat file?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Javacisnotrecognized, post:2, topic:140208”] copy file.dat file.bat call file.bat del file.bat

as far as I know, the command interpreter requires files to end in .bat for them to be valid batch files.[/quote]
sounds good.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a batch file load from a .dat file?

item.title: Making a batch file load from a .dat file?
item.dc:creator: @nade nade
item.description:
@nade wrote:

Write your data to a .bat file and shell execute it.
Rep me dick.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a batch file load from a .dat file?

item.title: Making a batch file load from a .dat file?
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

copy file.dat file.bat
call file.bat
del file.bat

as far as I know, the command interpreter requires files to end in .bat for them to be valid batch files.

Read full topic
